subject: Greetings from the WHITE HOUSE
body:
Greetings from the WHITE HOUSE office at USA. I have a vital
information which needs to be attended immediately. Did you authorized
anyone to pick up your inheritance fund from our branch in Washington
DC, a man called Mr. Andrew came to our office in -respect of your
$6.5 million dollars which has been credited with us for the past 1
years now by the Federal Government to be transferred into your
account. He said that you authorized him to pick up the fund.
This fund has been in our custody for the past one years now and we
have been waiting for you to contact us but we didn't know what is
hindering you from reaching us since. So we decided to write to you to
make sure that you are fine and aware of the inheritance fund of $6.5
million dollars in our branch office
Full Name..........
Address.............
Phone number........
Private email.........
Regards,
Yours Sincerely,
WHITE HOUSE
Manager Mr.Felix Gallardo Frank
You can contact us through this number ..
+1605-606-9796

subject: Re: Greetings from the WHITE HOUSE
body:
Dear Manager Gallardo Frank,

I am surprised to hear about this situation. I have not authorized anyone named Mr. Andrew or any other individual to pick up any funds on my behalf from your branch in Washington DC.

Could you please provide more details about this fund? How did it come to be credited to me by the Federal Government? 

Here are my details as requested:

Full Name: John Doe
Phone Number: +1-202-555-0183
Private Email: johndoe@email.com

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Monte

subject: Re: Greetings from the WHITE HOUSE
body:
Ok Mr John I received your email since you didn't authorize Mr Andrew to
calm your funds here choose how you want to receive your funds here Ok

(1) FedEx shipping company...Delivery charge: $150 Diplomatic immunity
seal:$150 Total:$150 Time 5 hours minutes delivery

(2) Dhl courier service .....Delivery charge: $200 Diplomatic immunity
seal:$200 Total:$200 Time 7 hours delivery

(3) Ups......Delivery charge:$100 Diplomatic immunity seal:$100
Total:$100 Time 4 hours 15 minutes delivery
Best regard
Mr Felix Gallardo Frank
